name: 埃里克·沃伦霍尔特
name_full: 埃里克·沃伦霍尔特 Eric Vorenholt

last_movies.title: 挪威的维京人 第三季
利勒哈默尔 第一季

introduction: Eric is a Norwegian actor. He has played roles in numerous of TV series and films including 'The Kings choice' which was the Norwegian entry for the Best Foreign Language Film at the 89th Academy Awards.Eric was born in Holland - Amsterdam but grew up on the east coast of Norway in a small town called Larvik. At the age of 11, Eric found his passion for acting when he saw the blockbuster film 'Hook' directed by Steven Spielberg. After seeing this film, Eric was inspired to play a part in a school film project and ever since that moment he knew what his purpose in life was. Eric also discovered his passion for martial arts when his father introduced him to the famous Bruce Lee movie 'Enter the dragon' at the age of 12. Today Eric holds a 3rd degree black belt in Taekwondo and he is still very much active in the sport and he lives by the martial art code of conduct.In 2017 Eric played the lead role in the film 'Nundalsdrapet / The uncalled. In 2018 this film was shortlisted for the BAFTA film awards.Eric has worked on popular TV shows like 'Norsemen' and the HBO Nordic 'Beforeigners'. And since Eric is such a multi talent he performed and did his own stunts as well.Eric is a dedicated and hardworking actor who is determined to reach his goals in the creative path he has set his focus upon.
